column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza was alright but would have been much better if it warm. I placed an advance order for delivery 2 hours later at 7p. The driver didn't arrive until 7:15 and had only brought half the order. He said he would be back in 10 minutes with the rest. Thirty minutes later
column2: I called asking for an updated status and was asked if I still wanted the rest of the order--um
column3: yes? I explicitly told the driver I wanted it. They only offered to either refund that part of the order or let me keep waiting. It has now been 45 minutes of waiting
column4: an hour past the scheduled time
column5: my original delivery is cold and I was told the driver was leaving the door 15 minutes ago. Poor customer service for delivery. Be wary
column6: even for simple two item delivery.
